FuncDef:
The mac-duplication command displays the EVPN-MAC-duplication view.
The mac-duplication disable command disables the function of MAC duplication of the current instance.
The undo mac-duplication disable command enables the function of MAC duplication of the current instance.
By default, MAC duplication function is enabled, the EVPN-MAC-duplication view is not displayed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To modify the configuration of MAC duplication suppression, run the mac-duplication command to enter the EVPN-MAC-duplication view first. Then, run the detect loop-times command to modify the parameter settings of the function.
Run the mac-duplication disable command to disable the function of MAC duplication.
